Description.p: The User account uses a password of "User". This would allow anyone to log into the web application via HTTP and abuse the application. This account is most commonly associated with Emerson Network Power "IntelliSlot Web Cards" which may indicate that related power infrastructure may be impacted by a malicious actor.

Solution.summary: Fix Default HTTP account: User password: User

workaround.p: Change the password to a strong non-default value.
